story.title: Our Story
story.p1: AGA Construction Group is a full-service home improvement and construction company based in Oranjestad, Aruba. We specialize in carpentry, flooring installation, plumbing, and complete renovation services for residential and commercial properties.
story.p2: Our mission is to provide high-quality craftsmanship, reliable service, and professional results on every project, regardless of size. We are committed to delivering durable, functional, and visually appealing solutions tailored to each client's needs.
